name: easy-hotel-blocks
description: Example block scaffolded with Create Block tool.
author: The WordPress Contributors

scripts.build: npm run build:accomodation-grid && npm run build:search-form && npm run build:booking-form && npm run build:accomodation-gallery && npm run build:accomodation-info && npm run build:check-in-out-times && npm run build:availability-calendars && npm run build:accomodation-slider
scripts.start: wp-scripts start --blocks-manifest --webpack-src-dir=public/includes/gutenberg/blocks/accomodation-grid/src --output-path=public/includes/gutenberg/blocks/accomodation-grid/build && wp-scripts start --blocks-manifest --webpack-src-dir=public/includes/gutenberg/blocks/search-form/src --output-path=public/includes/gutenberg/blocks/search-form/build && wp-scripts start --blocks-manifest --webpack-src-dir=public/includes/gutenberg/blocks/booking-form/src --output-path=public/includes/gutenberg/blocks/booking-form/build && wp-scripts start --blocks-manifest --webpack-src-dir=public/includes/gutenberg/blocks/accomodation-gallery/src --output-path=public/includes/gutenberg/blocks/accomodation-gallery/build && wp-scripts start --blocks-manifest --webpack-src-dir=public/includes/gutenberg/blocks/accomodation-info/src --output-path=public/includes/gutenberg/blocks/accomodation-info/build && wp-scripts start --blocks-manifest --webpack-src-dir=public/includes/gutenberg/blocks/check-in-out-times/src --output-path=public/includes/gutenberg/blocks/check-in-out-times/build && wp-scripts start --blocks-manifest --webpack-src-dir=public/includes/gutenberg/blocks/availability-calendars/src --output-path=public/includes/gutenberg/blocks/availability-calendars/build && wp-scripts start --blocks-manifest --webpack-src-dir=public/includes/gutenberg/blocks/accomodation-slider/src --output-path=public/includes/gutenberg/blocks/accomodation-slider/build
